title: Installing Lol in new pc
body: Hello, I just bought a new pc and downloaded the lol installer. The thing is that after installing, when it comes to the client update part is taking forever, with an ETA of near 3000 minutes. I checked my internet connection to see if it was going slow or something, but speed was ok (4.5 - 7 Mbps according to the test). Also, if I interrupt the download, the next time I try to start it the panel says that data is corrupt or something and I'm forced to uninstall and start over again. This is starting to be frustrating, is there something I can do to solve this?

replies.body: Grats on your new rig!  Make sure your OS is up to date to make sure it has necessary products and settings.  Since it's a new pc, your settings in general as well as drivers may need some tuning.  Update your OS, drivers, and run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your network is in good shape while reaching our specific services.
